properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 c2 v8 v9 v10 v11 v12

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Heigh ho, heigh ho, it's off to war we go

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We'll hack and slash, and kick some ass

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Our polearms high we'll make them cry

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We'll join the fray, our foes to slay

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: We'll deal some foe a mighty blow

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Their wall we'll break, and banner take

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Our swords will swing, their heads will ring

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: We are not bards, we are the Guards

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: High ho heigh ho, it's back from war we go

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: We beat their best, it's time to rest

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: We're really beat, it's time to eat

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: Our armor stinks, it's time for drinks

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: We've dropped our gear, now where's the beer?

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: We're strong and hearty, it's time to party!
